attributes.action: Make Child abuse, Treason and Terrorism Capital Crimes.
attributes.additional_details: There have been far too many crimes recently with obvious terrorist overtones miss labeled, drunk drivers or mental health issues to hide the true levels of terrorism in this country. This is a crime that destroys public trust and should hold sever consequences.
attributes.background: This country is out of control. Legislate to bring back the death penalty for 1, Child Abuse. 2, Treason. 3, Terrorism.  We also demand stern penalties for those who hold jobs in public trust, such as MP's, Police, CPS, Main Stream media who willfully hide crimes from the British public.
